Frank R.
 
Isn't that what I said in my initial post?
 
If not that's what=
 I meant!
 
I have been saying all along we need to spread the positive mes=
sage and create harmony.
 
but I believe it starts here with the researcher=
s, lets develop harmony of mind and energy amongst ourselves 
while spreadi=
ng the word to others.
 
Bruce
Bruce Halliday 


To: EVP-ITC@...=
mFrom: warrior18eii@...: Fri, 25 Jan 2008 07:05:37 -0800Subject: =
Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: Posted just a few new FB#12 files some interesting sweep =
rate answers






You can disagree, I will let'cha! LOL I think this is a =
misunderstanding between us once again. The whole point of the communicatio=
n is to bring about the spiritual evolution of mankind. To convince not us =
but others that their is an existence greater than the small petty worlds w=
e have created around ourselves. They mean to increase our humanity, tolera=
nce to change, and unconditional love for one another so that we can join t=
hat existence with comfort. The very same communications you are getting fr=
om Mike and Lisa, you are getting by way of influence through your spiritua=
l connection to them and many others who remain silent.It is our job to spr=
ead the word to as many that will listen of what we have learned. Not to ju=
st sit in our extra bedrooms, garages, attics or whatever and test differen=
t combinations of radios and misc circuitry. The positive messages are what=
 is important not the equipment. We need to change people's attitudes.Regar=
ds,Frank R.
----- Original Message ----From: bruce halliday <paranormalinve=
stigating@...>To: evp-itc@yahoogroups.comSent: Friday, January 25, =
2008 8:43:08 AMSubject: RE: [EVP-ITC] Re: Posted just a few new FB#12 files=
 some interesting sweep rate answers

Frank, I have to disagree.I believe t=
hey have a purpose for putting so much effort into relating this communicat=
ion in the hopesthat we will strive to better the communication so as to ge=
t better and clearer messages that convey their precise intention. Mike and=
 Lisa have told me how difficult it is to transmit this communication and t=
hey have a sense of urgency in their messagestrying to make us sit up and t=
ake notice.  I would hate to believe they do not care about the outcome of =
man kind and ignore our problems, no matter how petty they may seemto a hig=
her being. there has to be a method and an end to their means. I don't thin=
k they are participating in this miraculous communication for entertainment=
. If I am misunderstanding your meaning, which has happened to us in the pa=
st. Please let me know. Bruce
Bruce Halliday 
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .comF=
rom: warrior18eii@ yahoo.comDate: Fri, 25 Jan 2008 06:28:17 -0800Subject: R=
e: [EVP-ITC] Re: Posted just a few new FB#12 files some interesting sweep r=
ate answers




Bruce,The powers that be on the other side can't even begin=
 to relate to human rationality or our petty perspectives. The beings I am =
talking about know exactly what we are conversing about at the moment it is=
 typed on the screen. With one thought of them they are aware of your prese=
nce. Them seeing us in not an issue...lol. We have their attention but for =
the most part they don't have ours (as in the human race).Regards,Frank R.
=
----- Original Message ----From: bruce halliday <paranormalinvestiga ting@h=
otmail. com>To: evp-itc@yahoogroups .comSent: Thursday, January 24, 2008 6:=
09:22 PMSubject: RE: [EVP-ITC] Re: Posted just a few new FB#12 files some i=
nteresting sweep rate answers

LC, I believe that is what our spirit friend=
s are striving for,to let mankind know there is something bigger than ourse=
lves. Maybe if the powers that be could hear that with their own ears from =
the otherside they may stop and take a breath of rationality. As for the ca=
talyst I think that is what we are meant to be! Bruce
Bruce Halliday 
To: E=
VP-ITC@yahoogroups .comFrom: lcdupla@yahoo. comDate: Thu, 24 Jan 2008 23:54=
:12 +0000Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re: Posted just a few new FB#12 files some inte=
resting sweep rate answers


Bruce,It's going to take a major change for ha=
rmony, peace and elevated mindset to occur in mankind...major perspective c=
hange for sure. That will demand some catalyst to unite- transform minds IM=
HO.LC--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com, bruce halliday <paranormalinvestig at=
ing@... > wrote:>> > LC,> > In my opinion what our friends mean by the mess=
ages> of "no more time" or "time running out" Is meant > as a warning to ma=
nkind that if we do not change and realise that life > and mother earth are=
 precious, and how to live together> in "harmony" we are doomed to extincti=
on.> > The sense of urgency I believe is meant to make us understand that g=
lobal tensions > at this time could very well bring about this destruction,=
 If someone decides to turn left instead of right.> > That's my take on the=
se type of messages, and I get at least one every couple of sessions.> > Br=
uce> Bruce Halliday > > > To: EVP-ITC@...: lcdupla@...: Thu, 24 Jan 2008 21=
:05:50 +0000Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re: Posted just a few new FB#12 files some i=
nteresting sweep rate answers> > > > > Nice, interesting files, Bruce. You =
and FS (his post today) got me wondering about this time no more thing...no=
t to mention I heard similar statements of urgency over my RS box set-up, t=
oo. Any more ideas regarding this, Bruce...FS.. .others? I personally belie=
ve time to be illusion, and I also know it is written "time will be no more=
" (biblical future prophecy).Still not sure where I fall with this, other t=
han I do agree on this urgency, elevating consciousness, etc LC--- In EVP-I=
TC@yahoogroups .com, "bhali333" <paranormalinvestig ating@> wrote:>> Hey bo=
y's and girls,> > Here are some new Frank's box files. You may find the one=

researchers please take note of > the different sound between Frank's box a=

uces are very unique to each > FB.> > Bruce> > > > > > > > ____________ ___=
